channel.title: Dr.JUNG - zola
channel.description: A simple blog theme focused on writing powered by Bulma and Zola

item.title: blog Deployment using Github Pages
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
zola 를 이용해 만든 블로그를 localhost 에서 github-Pages 로 이동하는 과정입니다.
zola 의 Documention을 따라하면서 놓친 부분을 추가해서 메모해둡니다.

item.title: 테마 2가지 사용하기
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
zola 의 Deep-Thought theme 을 이용해서 만들던 중, Book theme 을 함께 쓰려고 조금씩 수정을 했습니다.
그 과정에서 겪은 시행착오를 메모합니다.

item.title: Theme extension
item.author: Unknown
item.description: DeepThought theme can be extended with usual Zola extension mechanisms.

item.title: Welcome to DeepThought
item.author: Unknown
item.description: This is a small example post of stuff you can do with the DeepThought theme. We'll try to represent all possible markdown and shortcode combinations here so you can develop easily.

item.title: Config Options
item.author: Unknown
item.description: DeepThought theme provides some config option like option to add favicon to your site, add avatar for profile, setup social links for the profile etc

item.title: Extended Shortcodes
item.author: Unknown
item.description: DeepThought theme provides multiple shortcodes on top of built-in ones in Zola. Please, have a look at the Config Options that explain how to enable them.
